duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide orthopedic nursing care to patients, including assessment, treatment, and patient education.
Maintain accurate and detailed medical records for patients and ensure proper documentation and record keeping.
Educate patients on post-operative care, wound care, and medication administration.
Manage and care for orthopedic patients, including wound care, pain management, and patient comfort.
Administer medications and treatments according to physician orders and nursing protocols.
Utilize critical thinking skills to assess patient conditions and respond appropriately in emergency situations.
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and healthcare team members to ensure quality care and positive patient outcomes.
Demonstrate empathy and compassion to support patients emotionally and mentally during their treatment and recovery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related field (Master's preferred)
